Noble.name: Noble
Noble.description: Born into privilege, you are accustomed to high society, politics, and perhaps a bit of intrigue.

Commoner.name: Commoner
Commoner.description: You grew up among the ordinary folk, learning a trade or working the land. You are resilient and practical.

Scholar.name: Scholar
Scholar.description: You spent years studying lore, history, or the arcane. Knowledge is your greatest asset.

Soldier.name: Soldier
Soldier.description: You have seen battle, whether in an army, militia, or mercenary company. You understand discipline and combat.

Outlaw.name: Outlaw
Outlaw.description: You have lived outside the law, relying on your wits, stealth, or force to survive.
